fixed_skill.desc: Deal Physical damage to 1 foe equal to 82.4/86.5/90.6% of Attack. 4.7/4.9/5.2% chance to inflict Brainwash for 2 turns.
fixed_skill.name: Brain Shake

innate_skill.desc: Deal Curse damage to 1 foe equal to 132.5/140.8/149.1% of Attack. Inflict 1 to 2 Curse stacks on the foe.
innate_skill.name: Eigaon

innate_skill.desc: Deal Physical damage to all foes equal to 40.8/42.8/44.9% of Attack. 3.4/3.6/3.7% chance to inflict Confuse for 2 turns.
innate_skill.name: Mind Slice

innate_skill.desc: Decrease SP cost of skills by 4.8%.
innate_skill.name: Spell Master III

passive_skill.desc: Increase ailment resistance by 25.4%. When an ally is inflicted with a debuff, increase target's ailment accuracy by 25%.
passive_skill.name: Herald of Death

passive_skill.desc: Increase ailment resistance by 25.4%. When an ally is inflicted with a debuff, increase target's ailment resistance by 28.5%.
passive_skill.name: Herald of Death I

passive_skill.desc: Increase ailment resistance by 25.4%. When an ally is inflicted with a debuff, increase target's ailment resistance by 31.5%.
passive_skill.name: Herald of Death II

passive_skill.desc: Increase ailment resistance by 25.4%. When an ally is inflicted with a debuff, increase target's ailment resistance by 35%.
passive_skill.name: Herald of Death III

showtime_skill.desc: Deal Curse damage to all foes equal to 90.0%/96.3%/102.6% of Attack. Increase damage taken by 19.6%/21.0%/22.3% for 2 turns.
showtime_skill.name: Highlight
